Package net.floodlightcontroller.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnumBitmaps.BitmapableEnum
    Enums used to represent individual flags needs to implement this interface
    OrderedCollection<E>
    A marker interface indicating that this Collection defines a particular iteration order.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionUtils
    OFAction helper functions.
    ClusterDFS  
    EnumBitmaps
    A utility class to convert between integer based bitmaps for (OpenFlow) flags and Enum and EnumSet based representations.
    FilterIterator<T>
    An iterator that will filter values from an iterator and return only those values that match the predicate.
    FlowModUtils
    Convert an OFFlowMod to a specific OFFlowMod-OFFlowModCommand.
    GroupUtils
    Convert OFGroups to and from JSON strings.
    InstructionUtils
    Convert OFInstructions to and from dpctl/ofctl-style strings.
    IterableIterator<T>
    Iterator over all values in an iterator of iterators
    IterableUtils
    Because it's handy.
    LinkedHashSetWrapper<E>
    A simple wrapper / forwarder that forwards all calls to a LinkedHashSet.
    LoadMonitor  
    LRUHashMap<K,V>  
    MatchUtils
    Utilities for working with Matches.
    MultiIterator<T>
    Iterator over all values in an iterator of iterators
    OFDPAUtils
    The Broadcom OF-DPA 2.0 specification provides an interesting packet processing pipeline.
    OFDPAUtils.GroupIds
    Generates group IDs according to the OF-DPA 2.0 spec.
    OFDPAUtils.Tables  
    OFMatchWithSwDpid  
    OFMessageDamper
    Dampens OFMessages sent to an OF switch.
    OFMessageDamper.DamperEntry
    An entry in the TimedCache.
    OFMessageUtils
    Tools to help work with OFMessages.
    OFMessageUtils.OFMessageIgnoreXid
    Simple class to streamline the use of OFMessage's equalsIgnoreXid() and hashCodeIgnoreXid() functions.
    OFPortModeTuple
    Make it easier to track a port and it's operating mode.
    OXMUtils
    A handy class to convert OXMs (and NXMs) to and from their IDs (U32=[class]+[field]+[has_mask]+[length]) and their string representations.
    ParseUtils
    Simple class to assist in parsing hex or decimal primitive types from String to their respective types.
    TimedCache<K>
    The key is any object/hash-code The value is time-stamp in milliseconds The time interval denotes the interval for which the entry should remain in the hashmap.
